nodes.text: Star Wars: The High Republic: Trail of Shadows

Star Wars: The High Republic: Trail of Shadows is an upcoming comic miniseries written by Daniel José Older, drawn by David Wachter and published by Marvel Comics as part of the Star Wars: The High Republic multimedia project. It will feature the characters Emerick Caphtor and Sian Holt.
